name: Prescribing of pregabalin (total DDD)
title: pregabalin DDD per 1000 patients
description: Prescribing of pregabalin (total DDD) per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Pregabalin is a relatively new drug, which is increasingly used in neuropathic and other types of pain.
Pregabalin costs have reduced recently, and there is still significant use in the NHS.
There are concerns about the potential for abuse.
Defined Daily Dose (DDD) for this measure.
numerator_columns: SUM(p.quantity * r.strnt)/300 AS numerator --divide by 300 to get DDD (https://www.whocc.no/atc_ddd_index/?code=N03AX16)
numerator_bnf_codes_query: SELECT DISTINCT presentation_code FROM {hscic}.bnf WHERE presentation_code LIKE '0408010AE%'
